scripts.start:dev: node -r dotenv/config scripts/inject-env.js && concurrently "node scripts/dev/watch-sass.js" "node scripts/dev/start-dev-server.js"
scripts.build: node scripts/build/clean.js && npm run build:css && node scripts/build/copy-html.js && node scripts/build/copy-js.js && node scripts/build/copy-assets.js && node scripts/build/optimize-images.js && node scripts/build/copy-sw.js && node scripts/build/copy-pwa.js && node scripts/build/replace-html.js && node scripts/build/replace-sw.js
